name: AdagePool
0:
”Alexa open Adage Pool and give me information about the Adage ticker”
”Alexa open Adage Pool and tell me the price of Ada”
”Alexa open Adage Pool and tell me about the current epoch”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: adage pool
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Adage Pool skill is for people who are interested in the Cardano Network.

This skill will provide you detailed information about the Adage stake pool and other public pools in the Cardano network. The Adage Pool Alexa skill is currently in beta, so not all pools are represented. 

You can get answers to how the pools you are follow are performing in terms of block production, active stake, pledge, saturation etc. 

You can also easily get information about the current price of ADA, when rewards are paid out, and where we are in the current epoch. 

To start, just say "Alexa, open Adage Pool". Next you can ask for help to get some ideas. 

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
